org.omancode.r.ui
Class RSwingConsole

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              org.omancode.r.ui.RSwingConsole
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, RMainLoopCallbacks
public class RSwingConsole
extends javax.swing.JComponent
implements RMainLoopCallbacks

Swing GUI Console with command history. Interfaces with the main R REPL (Read-eval-print loop).

Version:
$Revision: 26 $
Author:
Oliver Mannion
See Also:
Serialized Form

DEFAULT_FONT

public static final java.awt.Font DEFAULT_FONT
Default font for console : Monospaced plain 12 pt.

Constructor Detail

RSwingConsole

public RSwingConsole()
Create RSwingConsole with default font and display the prompt.

RSwingConsole

public RSwingConsole(boolean startWithPrompt)
Create RSwingConsole with default font.

Parameters:
startWithPrompt - show the prompt once R is loaded. If you want to load extra packages and libraries after R is loaded you will want this to be false and then call setPromptVisible(boolean).

RSwingConsole

public RSwingConsole(boolean startWithPrompt,
                     java.awt.Font font)
Create RSwingConsole.

Parameters:
startWithPrompt - show the prompt once R is loaded. If you want to load extra packages and libraries after R is loaded you will want this to be false and then call setPromptVisible(boolean).
font - font to use in console. If null uses DEFAULT_FONT.

setPromptVisible

public void setPromptVisible(boolean promptVisible)
Set the visibility of the console prompt.

Parameters:
promptVisible - if true the console prompt will show when R is ready for input (i.e: when R calls rReadConsole(Rengine, String, int)).

rReadConsole

public java.lang.String rReadConsole(Rengine re,
                                     java.lang.String prompt,
                                     int addToHistory)
Called by the main R REPL (Read-eval-print loop) to receive input. R is blocked when this is called. This means that any R Graphic Device windows (unless they are JavaGD windows) will not update or respond to events and will appear frozen while this method waits for and/or processes input.

Specified by:
rReadConsole in interface RMainLoopCallbacks
Parameters:
re - calling engine
prompt - prompt to be displayed at the console prior to user's input
addToHistory - flag telling the handler whether the input should be considered for adding to history (!=0) or not (0)
Returns:
user's input to be passed to R for evaluation
